ModMetaData.name: 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications
ModMetaData.author: Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
v0.18.0.0\n\n Adds various settings to customise your RimWorld experience.
Current features include: - Bugfixes for vanilla issues - Extend the time for pawns to undraft themselves - Change the threshold at which pawns retreat - Extend the time before you get kicked out of caravan maps
